name: Everyday Care
description:
Taking care is doing little things every day, without expecting anything back...

A small game about taking care of small things and taking its time. Water the flower every day (real time, the game can be closed) for five days, and watch it grow. It's as simple as that.

Made by a single person for the Extra Credits Game-jam 2020, on the theme of "Take care". Hope you like it (even if it asks for quite a bit of patience).

The game is open-source under the MIT License. The code can be found at:

https://github.com/QuentinDaveau/EverydayCare
